body.name: Storkcraft Steveston 5-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer (Gray) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Crib and Changing Table Combo with Drawer, Converts to Toddler Bed, Daybed and Full-Size Bed
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 56 mins
features: 5-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed (toddler guardrail sold separately), daybed, and full-size bed with headboard & optional footboard (conversion kit sold separately); Assembly required

INCLUDES STORAGE DRAWER AND CHANGING TABLE: Baby crib with universal design to match with any nursery style; Includes full-size drawer with 2 compartments; Attached changing table includes 2 open shelves, water-resistant changing pad with safety strap

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress; This baby crib may be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35in (89cm)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood, engineered wood, wood composites and includes Euro drawer glides; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment; Backed by 1-year warranty
Compatible with Toddler Safety Guardrail and Full-Size Crib Conversion Kit
body.description: With its classic arched headboard, solid wood panels and abundance of storage, the Storkcraft Steveston 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer is ideal for the modern living space. Featuring an attached changing table with a vinyl changing pad and safety strap, the Steveston provides a convenient place to change your baby. Offering a space-saving solution, this crib and changer boasts plenty of storage space with two open shelves and a large drawer underneath the crib so your child's belongings are always within reach. The Storkcraft Steveston 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer can be enjoyed for years as it features a three-position adjustable mattress base and converts into a toddler bed (optional Storkcraft Toddler Guardrail sold separately), daybed and full-size bed with headboard and footboard (Storkcraft Full-Size Crib Conversion Kit - Metal Bed Frame sold separately). The Storkcraft Steveston 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer is certified by the Juvenile Products Manufacturers Association (JPMA) and is stringently tested to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards to ensure the safest sleeping environment for your child. Constructed with high-quality pine wood and composites, the Storkcraft Steveston 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer is available in multiple durable non-toxic finishes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storkcraft Steveston 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer

Crib This crib is designed to accommodate your growing child. It features a three-positioned adjustable mattress support base. Set the mattress at the middle or highest height for your new born baby. Toddler Bed With or without a safety guardrail, this crib will grow with your child as they transition into a toddler bed. The toddler bed stage is recommended once your child surpasses the height of 35 inches. Safety guardrail is sold separately. Daybed For added versatility, and as your child continues to grow, this crib converts into a daybed. Full-Sized Bed This crib will last well into adolescence as it converts into a full-sized bed with headboard and footboard. Mattress and Storkcraft Full-Size Crib Metal Bed Frame Conversion Kit are sold separately.

The Storkcraft Portofino 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer is the ideal all-in-one sleep, storage, and changing solution for your baby's nursery. The Graco Remi 4-in-1 Convertible Crib & Changer is the perfect all-in-one sleep, storage, and changing solution for your baby's nursery. The Storkcraft Pacific 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer is an all-in-one nursery solution. The Pacific's attached changing table features a water-resistant changing pad with safety strap, and 2 open shelves for plenty of nursery storage. The Graco Benton 4-in-1 Convertible Crib & Changer combines our best-selling Benton convertible crib with an attached changing table, equipped with drawers and shelves. The Graco Solano 4-in-1 Convertible Crib & Changer with Drawer combines the classic, family-favourite, best-selling Solano design with the added convenience of a space-savings storage drawer and attached changing table with shelves.

Features a Changer and a Drawer Storkcraft Steveston 4-in-1 Convertible Crib and Changer with Drawer is an all-in-one solution with the convenience of a convertible crib, under-crib storage drawer, and an attached changing table with shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Its really well made. I love the gray color and the fact that it can convert to beds for later stages of life. They only complaint i have was how many pieces there were to put it together, which can't be helped if you want it to last forever. Worth the money and worth the time putting it together! I think the one thing you could add to the page for the crib would be a side link to make it easier to find the conversion pieces. I have yet to find the toddler bed concersion piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I literally assembled this myself with no experience. It did take me a few hours, but it works great. The bottom drawer is a bit small, but we use it solely for jammies on one side and accessories like socks, hats, bibs on the other. Love this crib. Hope to save it in case I ever have anymore kids and use it for them as well. Also like the changing table. We keep her changing supplies in a basket and lots of blankets etc… on the shelves. We are on limited space and I feel like it’s perfect for us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A new addition
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what it looked like, they loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have not been able to use the actual crib yet because we have a brand new baby, but the crib and changing table are perfect together. We love the room and the shelves with the changing table. It’s very sturdy as well. The only downside was that it did not have all the hardware and we had to go to Ace to buy hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. Beautiful color. There was a bit of damage on one of the sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Seems very sturdy and well made. Time and toddler will tell! The color is beautiful.Very well packed. The box arrived in horrible condition. Looked like it had been banged around a lot in shipment, may have done battle with a forklift. Corners were crushed, there were a couple of big holes, and the tape had come loose in several areas. It's very very heavy, and the poor delivery driver carried it to the door in a pouring rain. But the crib itself was in perfect condition.Something to be aware of - the changing table can only be attached to the right side. We were hoping to be able to choose the side it went on, but no joy on that. Also, the drawer is shallow. But it holds little baby size diapers and wipes or receiving blankets and sheets, so it's useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The packaging was definitely a little beat up but that's expected it came to me and Massachusetts all the way from California.Nothing was missing,Nothing was damaged. a lot of reviews said there was a strong chemical smell.. while I DIDNT experience that at all.It was pretty easy to put together. It's very well made, and came with very good hardware and every tool needed.I would say my only complaint would be the instruction manual, it was all pictures literally no word describing directions so that made it a little harder for my husband and I were able to do it in under 2 hours, considering I'm 8 months pregnant I wasn't too much help to him LOLI would recommend this crib to ANY parents expecting. For the price it's absolutely amazing and better than I could have expected!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this crib I just wish it went a little higher so moms like me who has a c section and can’t bend over to much can put the baby inside and not have to bend over so much to put the baby in and out
